desc: ordinary day press - a letterpress shop

layout.text: A LETTERPRESS STUDIO IN FORT WORTH, TEXAS

Ordinary Day Press is focused on making the paper goods of your dreams. We specialize in everything from custom wedding invitation suites, to stationery & business cards, as well as greeting cards and art prints. Every piece of paper that comes out of our studio is hand-fed through one of our antique presses and is sure to leave an impression (I'm so sorry, please stick around for better puns).
